peril.views.slick.states.gameStates

Class SlickSetup.RulerSelector

  • java.lang.Object
    • peril.views.slick.states.gameStates.SlickSetup.RulerSelector
  • Enclosing class:
    SlickSetup

    private final class SlickSetup.RulerSelector
extends java.lang.Object
    This displays the SlickPlayers that are currently in the game to the user so that they may be clicked in order to change the ruler of the selected SlickCountry to that of the clicked SlickPlayer.
    Since:
    2018-03-15
    Version:
    1.01.01
    Author:
    Joshua_Eddy
    See Also:
    SlickSetup

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static int PLAYER_X_OFFSET
      The offset in the x direction that the SlickPlayer icons will be displayed around the selected SlickCountry's army.
      private static int PLAYER_Y_OFFSET
      The offset in the y direction that the SlickPlayer icons will be displayed around the selected SlickCountry's army.
      private java.util.List<SlickPlayer> players
      The SlickPlayers that the user can select using this SlickSetup.RulerSelector.
      private Point position
      The Point position of this SlickSetup.RulerSelector.
      private boolean visible
      Whether or not this SlickSetup.RulerSelector is visible or not.
